Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: The process description outlines steps that involve potential bias through XOR branching and introduces unfairness during the community affiliation check.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Identified that the XOR branching after the skill assessment introduces a potential unfair advantage to certain candidates.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - IND
Text: Proposed two models: one with potential unfairness and another eliminating the unfairness by removing the XOR branch.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Ensured that the workflow for both models adheres to the described hiring process.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Simplified the workflow by consolidating common steps (e.g., managerial review and final decision) after the XOR branch in the first model.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Confirmed that the second model ensures fairness by applying a single cultural fit check to all applicants.

Name: Pattern Recognition - IND
Text: Recognized structural similarities between the two models and focused on eliminating bias in the second model.
